description: Styles for a Tic Tac Toe web application, defining theme variables and layout styles.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main app container with centering and background styling.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid styling for the game board layout.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the game board.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for indicating the current status of the game.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button of the game.
